"Xiera": "Now beginning the mission. You're restricted to this area of Tokyo. Everyone, please be careful..."

"Happy Halloween! Hi there, real me!
It's Magical★Xiera☆"
"Happy Halloween... Wait, that's the Phantom of me! Magical... What? What does that mean?"
"You're asking that now?! Didn't you dream me up in this cute costume cause you wanted to have fun with everyone?"
"You can't say things like that so directly! It does look like you're having fun, but it wasn't my wishes that brought you to life!"
"Huh, is that true? You're not trying to trick a fellow Xiera, are you? Cause so far, this has all gone perfectly for you!"

"I think I know who's behind all this...
But this seems really out of character for...!
I'll investigate this right away!"
"...Alright, I'll trust you. I'll concentrate on fighting as hard as I can. Thank you very much!"
